headers.access-control-expose-headers: ETag, Link, Location, Retry-After, X-GitHub-OTP, X-RateLimit-Limit, X-RateLimit-Remaining, X-RateLimit-Used, X-RateLimit-Resource, X-RateLimit-Reset, X-OAuth-Scopes, X-Accepted-OAuth-Scopes, X-Poll-Interval, X-GitHub-Media-Type, X-GitHub-SSO, X-GitHub-Request-Id, Deprecation, Sunset

nodes.body: When you turn store option off, your model settings need to have `response_include=["reasoning.encrypted_content"]`. This SDK does not automatically set it under the hood because non-reasoning models such as gpt-4.1 do not work with the option. Please pass the additional option to your ModelSettings.

@seratch yes that solved the issue, I just found it as well. Thanks!

```
some_agent = Agent(
            name="some agent",
            handoff_description="instructions",
            instructions=dynamic_agent_prompt,
            model="gpt-5.1",
            model_settings=ModelSettings(
                reasoning=Reasoning(effort="low", summary="auto"), 
                verbosity="low", 
                parallel_tool_calls=True,
                max_tokens=10000,
                store=False,
               extra_body={
                    "include": ["reasoning.encrypted_content"]
               }
            ),
            tools=[tools]
        )
```
